memberdef.name: PKDTESTS_DEFAULT_FIPS
memberdef.initializer: f(client, rsa_default, cmd, setup_rsa, teardown) \ f(client, ecdsa_256_default, cmd, setup_ecdsa_256, teardown) \ f(client, ecdsa_384_default, cmd, setup_ecdsa_384, teardown) \ f(client, ecdsa_521_default, cmd, setup_ecdsa_521, teardown)

memberdef.name: PKDTESTS_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: /* Default passes by server key type. */ \ PKDTESTS_DEFAULT_FIPS(f, client, cmd)

memberdef.name: PKDTESTS_DEFAULT_OPENSSHONLY
memberdef.initializer: /* Default passes by server key type. */ \ f(client, ed25519_default, cmd, setup_ed25519, teardown)

memberdef.name: PKDTESTS_KEX
memberdef.initializer: /* Kex algorithms. */ \ PKDTESTS_KEX_COMMON(f, client, kexcmd)

memberdef.name: emit_keytest
memberdef.initializer: static void torture_pkd_## client ## _ ## testname(void **state) { \ const char *tname = "torture_pkd_" #client "_" #testname; \ char testcmd[2048] = { 0 }; \ (void) state; \ snprintf(&testcmd[0], sizeof(testcmd), sshcmd, tname, tname); \ torture_pkd_runtest(tname, testcmd); \ }

memberdef.name: emit_testmap
memberdef.initializer: { "torture_pkd_" #client "_" #testname, \ emit_unit_test(client, testname, sshcmd, setup, teardown) },

memberdef.name: emit_unit_test
memberdef.initializer: cmocka_unit_test_setup_teardown(torture_pkd_ ## client ## _ ## testname, \ torture_pkd_ ## setup, \ torture_pkd_ ## teardown)

memberdef.name: emit_unit_test_comma
memberdef.initializer: emit_unit_test(client, testname, sshcmd, setup, teardown),

memberdef.name: default_payload_len
memberdef.initializer: = sizeof(default_payload_buf)
